newsitem.title: FINLAND: LAROX SEES 20 PCT 1996 NET SALES RISE.
newsitem.headline: LAROX SEES 20 PCT 1996 NET SALES RISE.

text.p: Finnish industrial filter and valve manufacturer Larox Oy said in a statement on Friday its target to increase full-year 1996 net sales by 20 percent looked likely to materialise.
In January-June, net sales increased 36.5 percent to 118.2 million markka.

Larox said its end-June orderstock would help maintain a positive result trend. The company reported a 7.4 million markka first half pre-tax profit compared with a 5.3 million markka loss in the corresponding period last year.
